abstract: Roberta Smith reviews solo exhibit What Before Comes After by artist Squeak Carnwath at Jane Lombard Gallery.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Carnwath’s exhibit at Jane Lombard Gallery is her first solo show in New York in more than a decade.

headline.main: Review: Squeak Carnwath Speaks With Her Varied Palette
headline.print_headline: Review: Squeak Carnwath Speaks With Her Varied Palette

snippet: Ms. Carnwath’s exhibit at Jane Lombard Gallery is her first solo show in New York in more than a decade.
